context: The word 'kirjutasin' is the first person singular past tense form of the Estonian verb 'kirjutama', which means 'to write'. In this context, it appears with the postposition 'alla' (meaning 'under' or 'below'), creating the phrase 'kirjutasin alla' which means 'wrote under/below'. This is commonly used in formal contexts when signing documents - one writes their signature underneath a document text or places a mark below certain information. The '-n' ending indicates past tense and first person singular (I wrote).
